Uses of Interface
entities.orders.Orders

  • Packages that use Orders 
    Package Description
    entities
    Contains basic entities used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.
    entities.orders
    Contains all the orders which the user provides during game phase.
    strategy  

    • Uses of Orders in entities

      Fields in entities with type parameters of type Orders 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.Queue<Orders> Player.d_orders  
      Methods in entities that return Orders 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Orders Player.nextOrder()
      method to get next order from the orders queue

    • Uses of Orders in entities.orders

      Classes in entities.orders that implement Orders 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Advance
      This class represents the advance command.
      class  Airlift
      This class represents the airlift card.
      class  Blockade
      Whenever blockade card is used, the player can triple the armies present in one of the country they control and in return looses control over that country, neutral player gets the control of the country.
      class  Bomb
      This class represents the bomb card.
      class  Deploy
      Players can place reinforcements to the countries they control.
      class  Diplomacy
      This class represents the diplomacy card.
      class  Dummy  
      class  Exit

      Logic for the Cheater Player, acquiring all the neighbor countries and doubling the armies.

      method that is implemented by concrete strategy classes
